column1: delegate…..The  Courts  have  recognized  that  duties  imposed  on  Ministers
and the powers given to Ministers are normally exercised under the authority
of the Ministers by responsible officials of the department……….In general,
therefore,  a  Minister  is  not  obliged  to  bring  his  own  mind  to  bear  upon  a
matter entrusted  to him  by  statutes,  but  may  act  through a  duly authorized
